data.title: Benefits and gift card - Small Danish Hotels
data.meta_description: Skovshoved Hotel is a member of Small Danish Hotels who offers membership with Small Hotels Guest Club; Benefits, that you can use when staying with us
data.text:
Small Danish Hotels Benefit

Small Danish Hotels Guest Club

Skovshoved Hotel is a member of Small Danish Hotels who offers membership with Small Hotels Guest Club; Benefits, when you stay with us.

Benefits is the Small Danish Hotels Guest Club, giving members reward points every time you stay at Skovshoved Hotel or any of their more then 60 other cosy inns and beautiful castles all around the small Kingdom of Denmark. Membership of Benefits is entirely free and as a member you will automatically get access to the best offers via a weekly e-mail.

Read more about Benefits

The points collected can be used as payment, or partial payment on overnight stays, a delicious dinner at a restaurant, or on beautiful gift items in our points shop, it’s entirely up to you.

You can view your point status at any time simply by logging in to
